website_summaries.verdict: A premium DJ USB controller designed to work with a number of audio software options.
pros: Uses large, low latency jog wheels to replicate vinyl manipulation such as scratching
Built-in knobs and buttons have a hefty, high-quality feel
Comes with a light digital audio workstation software
cons: Controller lacks automatic compatibility with some software options

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable, full featured DJ controller.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great affordable DJ controller. Very solid build quality. Buttons are very responsive, jog wheels feel just as sensitive as the higher end Pioneer controllers. Pad scratch feature is cool, not overpowered lol. Cross fader moves smoothly for clean cuts and scratches. Mixer section has all the features for professionally sounding performances. Pitch sliders are a bit short ranged, these could have been longer like the similarly priced Numark Mixtrack Pro 3. Comes with Serato DJ Lite which offers a few improvements from Serato DJ Intro such as monitoring line meters for volume management. The unit has a good weight and offers grip ridges for handling. I'm very satisfied with this product and strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aneil_TT

customer_reviews.title: Great. I recently just had my 1st gig and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. I recently just had my 1st gig and I killed it so I definitely recommend this controller. There are also alot of tutorial on YouTube for this controller and previous editions
customer_reviews.author: michael blackman

customer_reviews.title: Great controller, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have the ddj sx3 controller with uses serato DJ pro. I bought this unit because I wanted something smaller. It has a really good feel to it. Goldie locks size. Not too big and not too small. My issue is this. It unlocks Serato DJ lite. Not serato DJ pro. Even though I have DJ pro which works with the sx3. Serato says I still have to purchase an upgrade licences to use it with this controller. I guess I didn't read the fine print. Serato DJ lite is a bit too limited for me.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: The headphone jack is for a 1/8 plug and not a 1/4 like the rest of the controllers
customer_reviews.text: There’s a lot of controversy about this controller. I got it simply because I wanted to learn a new platform and search for a new hobby. This controller so far has been really easy to use. There’s a good decent amount of features to use even with the Serrato Dj Lite software. I love it. I plan on mastering this to upgrade later. But i would highly recommend this to anybody trying to get in the dj scene.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a DJ for 25+ years, and been using Numark, Traktor & Gemini. my latest was Traktor S2 with Traktor Pro, but started to have issues with S2 controller not connecting to my laptop. so, I searched for something similar to what I have and came across the Pioneer DDJ-SB3. I tell ya what... I Love It!! Very easy to use and I am using it with VDJ8 program. Its just a tad bit longer in length (about an 1.5 inches), but so many more features when compared to my previous controller! I just wish that the soundcard in the controller had TRS/XLR outs instead of the RCA. but other than that... This controller is truly AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I got it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this SB3 to add to my portable gear set. Coming over from using a Mixtrack Pro 3 for a while, it is a little different. More functions and the ability to control 4 decks. Ran it through some paces for about 45 minutes so far. Very happy I got it. Trim controls are great to have which were missing on the MTP3. Pad scratch, I heard all the noise over it. Its ehhh for me. I probably will not use them even to learn with. Fade fx are a nice touch for mixing in to the next song. This is a great unit to start on or even for a lightweight mobile setup like I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome DJ controller great size
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pioneer DJ controller this thing is so fun so compact this is a 100% awesome addition to add to your studio or on go DJ out the box ready to party
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: More than enough for beginners
customer_reviews.text: 100% would recommend this to any beginners using Serato DJ. The features are more than enough for a beginner and with practise, you can do a lot of advanced mixing with this little guy. FX section a bit limited but you can achieve cool effects with some creativity. Also LOVE the 8 hot cues!!
customer_reviews.author: crimmynull

customer_reviews.title: This item was defective right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to learn how to DJ using the Pioneer DJ DDJ- SB3 DJ Controller. I downloaded the Serato DJ Lite software, purchased speakers, a mic and headphones only for the controller not to turn on. I purchased all of these items new, with new wires and only one red light lite up on the controller....nothing else worked. I first used my Mac then my PC both to no avail. I practiced with the Serato software and produced sound from my pc but when I connected to the controller there was no sound coming from the speakers. I wasted an entire day trying to get a defective item to work. I'm returning this item today
customer_reviews.author: Kendrah Underwood

customer_reviews.title: The DDJ-SB3 has all you need at a budget price.
customer_reviews.text: Not just for beginners. The DDJ-SB3 is the right tool for pros too. Compact and light weight but has what you need. I've been a DJ since 1993. Took some time off now I'm back in the game. The DDJ-SB3 allowed me to get the controller part of my setup covered so I could beef up my sound system and get the lights I needed. Maybe one day I'll upgrade and gift this one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Riggins

customer_reviews.title: overall good unit, but I should have opted for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy effects and scratching pads, no cue mix knob anymore from the SB2, overall good unit, but I should have opted for the next level up as this is barely outside the realm of a toy.
customer_reviews.author: The McCowans

customer_reviews.title: NO Sound
customer_reviews.text: I called pioneer they told me i had to fill out a questioner i did they never called me the product will not play through computer or speakers. The customer service is not helping me. I am considering sending it back. It is collecting dust. I only wanted customer service to help and they will not even call me or respond. I do not recommend this product I will respond if they call and can help me get sound. THe piece itsself looks great but with out sound whats the use? UPDATE: pioneer finally called and we resolved the issue. The unit is great. I will change from 1 to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keith

customer_reviews.title: Bit pricey but excellent durability! Does NOT include RCA cable
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind you cannot "acquire" Serato Pro in any other form for this to work, the buttons and knobs will only register if you fit it to the Lite version of Serato, unless you pay and create an account. Overall the weight is not too light and not too heavy, jog wheels responsive, and the program itself (Lite) is fair unless you want to change keys or record your own mixes. Highly recommended for beginners. Be aware it only includes the USB charger to connect to laptop, it does NOT have the RCA cable to connect to speakers. Must be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrone

customer_reviews.title: Great things come in little packages!
customer_reviews.text: Forget the Jazzy Jeff nonsense. This little powerhouse can take on controllers at 2x the price. Even with Serato light! Simple yet powerful. Get this, master it and move up to more expensive controllers . You won’t, just upgrade Serato’s software.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Virtual DJ
customer_reviews.text: Great controller. Easy to use. Works great. Wish it had more metal for the outer shell. I use this with Virtual DJ and it works as though it was made for Virtual DJ.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Its great. Buy it. Read review!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device. Keep in mind you’re going to either have to buy music from iTunes, download music from SoundCloud or use Tidal. Apple Music does not work with this device. Using Serato Is a little tricky and takes time to learn but it’s really awesome. Id recommend buying Serato pro...$129. Get a SoundCloud pay service and continue to buy songs from itunes. No Spotify! Plan on watching youtube videos to learn to use device.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this controller. As someone who purchased this just as a hobby and for fun, it was easy to set up and use. Serato is an easy program to navigate. I wish the additional functionality wasn’t locked behind a $100 upgrade to Serato but I get it. It’s pretty basic so I will tell you that the minute you open up this controller and start using it, you wish you had purchased a higher end controller with more features.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: A lot of function for little money
customer_reviews.text: It's only entry level equipment in the sense that the jog wheels are small and have no indication where the track is. Not really a problem unless that's something you need. I've tested it on both on a 2013 Macbook Pro and a new i3 quad Windows 10 build. Ran great on both. Serato DJ lite is included and packs a lot of features to get you going. FYI, you won't be able to hook a real turntable up to this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Valy

customer_reviews.title: No Off Switch
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a beginner just a lil compulsive I have really nice DJ equipment. It may seem like a small thing but there is no off switch. Most things have to be ejected from a computer, simply pulling the usb plug is not good enough. I understand this thing is a number one seller or at least top rated three years in a row. It's causing me problems with my sound card rebooting switching sound card back and forth no good. Other than that it's a perfect entry level, mid, maybe you want to travel lighter controller.
customer_reviews.author: Dandman

customer_reviews.title: Using DJPRO2
customer_reviews.text: sometimes the controller just FREEZES - everything remains functional but the lights stop working and cannot be reset until you unplug and restart - maybe a function of the software but not great during a live performance - awesome controller though, perhaps I need to use serato
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Y

customer_reviews.title: welcome to the world of djing
customer_reviews.text: this was my second dj controller. i upgraded from a numark. its a great controller for any beginner to start with. ive used this for almost 2 years before upgrading to a ddj 1000srt. I can only say good things about it because it worked for me. its super light and simple. its nearly entirely made of plastic which is why its so easy to carry. anyone who wants to get into djing should definitely buy this. it will provide nearly all things you need to get started
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my first controller board and I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first controller board and I LOVE IT.... easy to set up... easy to use... light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: LaMonte Frierson

customer_reviews.title: Great value & functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little board. The only weakness IMO is that the only output is RCA. I just grabbed myself an RCA-XLR dongle. It’s worked great for the DJ gigs I’ve done with it. This would be great for a beginner because it’s not expensive & has most of the same functionality that the expensive Pioneer boards have. It’s a little lightweight. But, I expected it to be on the lower end of what Pioneer makes. That’s not a knock at all. Pioneer’s DJ boards are the only ones I’ll use.
customer_reviews.author: Willworldwide

customer_reviews.title: Great as a starter unit for those wanting to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great as a starter unit for those wanting to get using Serato Lite or Pro. Recommend getting used to it, and ensure you get a Hard Case to carry it if you transport. You could damage the knobs. Good construction, nobs, and sliders a bit lightweight. For those wanting to get into DJ work, good unit to gain entry into it.
customer_reviews.author: Digital MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners and learning the basics of dj’ing!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the faders and knobs will get stuck on a setting even thought you are moving them. You will have everything plugged in correctly and (not every time- maybe 50% of the time) you will have to keep fooling with the faders and knobs until they catch on and then boom you have sound. I don’t know why.
customer_reviews.author: Fan!

customer_reviews.title: I have a question about no sound
customer_reviews.text: Do i need to connect the board to the amplifier or speacker so i will be able to have a sound? Once I connect the board to my computer the dj serato has no sound. but if i will remove it will have a sound. Then I tried to use headphone on the board but no sound. The only thing that ismissing in the setup is the board is not connected to an amplifier or speaker. Is this needed so i can able to hear a sound from the headphones?
customer_reviews.author: Aris A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite toy for the quarantine life. It is really easy to learn and it is not complicated at all. After I use it for a while I updated my software to pro and it adds up new layer of music taste. I am still using this and I feel like there are still lots of things to learn from this dj set.
customer_reviews.author: batuhan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great starter mixer for new dj's and for dj's who are about great sounding mixes with a decent array of effects. The layout is intuitive and I was able to get up and running in 10 minutes with my system. It's also fairly lightweight and easy to move about. All of this for a decent price from one of the most credible brands in music hardware.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nutshell: you can’t go wrong using this as a starter.
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says. Since this is a beginner model, and a popular one at that there are a ton of tutorials, as well the most popular software integrates with t seamlessly. I found it totally easy to use. I suspect that should you actually learn to use all the functionality that it’s good for a long time and highly varied number of gigs.
customer_reviews.author: Madbunny

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome Controller. I'm a Beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome Controller. I'm a Beginner, and using this Controller made it fun. I recently upgraded to DJ Pro, and the features are amazing. Sometimes, there is a small glitch and you just have to unplug and plug the USB port back in. But overall, this controller is good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Ng

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This little tiny lightweight thing is absolutely amazing! I can't get over how many different functions this thing has to offer. I'm from the old school days of scratching then inserting a CD into a big heavy turn table. This thing requires 1 USB plug and 1 audio plug to go into speakers and that's it! I'm having way too much fun mixing gym mixes for myself and my wife that I can save and throw into my phone. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Integrations

customer_reviews.title: Unit is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I am at the point now where when I plug it in none of the buttons do any of the functions in Serato. You also have to purchase Serato DJ which is an additional 200 dollars to do anything really. I have had a lot of back and forth with Serato and they have been really helpful. But the issue is the unit. Don't do it. Just spend a little more money on something that will actually work. It's cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid controller for getting back into Djing
customer_reviews.text: I used to spin vinyl back in the day for fun and probably have not done it in over 15yrs. Being asked to help dj a family wedding was the perfect opportunity for me to scoop this up and see how much it was like riding a bike. A lot of great features on this controller and has been great for re-learning this craft/hobby. Love the loop features and many of the cueing features so I can hop right into the hot spots on tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy What

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery/Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: This controller is just amazing, powerfull, smooth, well constructed, solid, amazing sound card. i will rate this product 10 stars instead of 5. THANK YOU VERY MUCH!.
customer_reviews.author: M Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners or as a backup system when doing smaller shows when you don't want to or can't pull all your normal gear out. Well built and laid out the same as upper end boards so moving back and fourth between them is very familiar.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Absher

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, light weight for travel. This controller has a lot of functionality making it easy for mixing and all that fo super easy to use, light weight for travel. This controller has a lot of functionality making it easy for mixing and all that cool stuff
customer_reviews.author: JMARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been dreaming for ten years of being a DJ in my free time. And this mixer was my selection for such purpose. I am still learning to make proper mixes, but there is enough material in YouTube to master the controls of the device. Mastering will take time, but it is something a potential buyer should be doing with pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Mix like a unprofessional professional...
customer_reviews.text: Bought purely for my own entertainment purposes and I love it. Easy to mix, feels well constructed and didn’t expect any less than quality coming from Pioneer. I’m also glad I tried the Serato software because compared to VirtualDJ, it’s 100% better and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: What’s the dill, Pickles?

customer_reviews.title: Okay starter
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay starter ddj, I'm rating one star because my volume mix slider under the "Pioneer DJ" logo is warped and actually doesnt line up with the lines that indicate mix volume. it's actually not loose or anything but doesnt ever line up on the same line, pretty annoying but I guess I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for this special event DJ
customer_reviews.text: I've had this controller for 6 months now and I have to say that I am very impressed with it. The ability to line up cues visually is great, the jog wheels are nice and big and have a great weight to them as well as a quality feel. Overall incredibly happy with the purchase and it was plug and play with DJay Pro 2.
customer_reviews.author: aaron j carbajal

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is very easy to use. There are many tutorials available on YouTube for those that need them. This lets me scratch and mix with absolutely no problem. Love it already!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dodson

customer_reviews.title: DONT NOT BY FROM THE SELLER
customer_reviews.text: I was Deployed and finally got it. Hooked up to my computer and it doesn’t work at all. The seller sold me a mixer that does not work
customer_reviews.author: KR Harker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Option for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product recommended by multiple youtubers as a to-go option if we were into learning how to be a DJ and weren’t familiar with the controller. Gotta say, buying it, that it has been one of the best decisions I made. I’m still learning, but once you pair tutorials available to you on Youtube with the almost intuitive arrangement of the buttons. Your gonna be having a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jaicol Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: great starter board for 16 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and has used it daily to learn and mix. He uses his prior knowledge and youtube videos to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mydunnewold

customer_reviews.title: Entry level controller?? I don't think so.
customer_reviews.text: She does more than you know. I'm a seasoned dj. Learn all features to make your mix set awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Maltese Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Quality is the number one thing and that is what pioneer has provided..
customer_reviews.text: I've always been an old school technics 1200's and vinyl's but as financial situation came about i lost my gear. Now i was afraid of this pioneer controller and serato software. Pioneer has lived up to their expectation and i have been very impressed and will continue to be impressed, thank you. Sincerely, A disabled DJ
customer_reviews.author: Edward L Sobreo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Controller
customer_reviews.text: Great intro controller. After a year I definitely want to upgrade to a 4 channel but this will get the job done for rookies and pros alike. Before this I had a Hercules JogVision (HJV) and what I prefer about this controller is the HJV needed a power source while the SB3 is USB powered which is great for playing anywhere with no worry (I've played in parks abs on the beach for example). Also the SB3 has 16 pads which are far easier to switch pad modes from sampler to hot cue and others. HJV only beats the SB3 in jog wheel quality and sound card quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kenrick PhilliP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My first controller and I love it. Best part for me is the plug and play aspect of it. Just one cord from your computer to your laptop and it works. I use Virtual Dj and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Pallares

customer_reviews.title: Sound issues
customer_reviews.text: There are sometimes when you slide the channel up during mixes that the volume won't sound. I'd have to slide it back down then up agian slowly to get it to sound. Not good for if you have to use this for a paying gig.
customer_reviews.author: Buy things

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller, some features not usable without upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love the controller, but wish they’d made it more clear that only 4 of the samplers per deck can be used unless you upgrade to the pro version of Serato.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pionner dj turntable
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this turntable. Makes a big difference in djaying super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This equipment is everything!!! It arrived in time for my husband for Father's Day
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners and intermediate
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price and functionality. It works just as well as the upgraded deck that’s around $650-800. Easy to port around and plug in.
customer_reviews.author: teresa m green

customer_reviews.title: Great , fun and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Love this board so much! Came in awesome condition , works well and easy for me to practice. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Roh

customer_reviews.title: Sick Deck
customer_reviews.text: Sick deck. Serato pro is the real winner. This unit is solid, sleek, feels good, looks good. Gotta long way to go learning to employ it to its full abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McNamara

customer_reviews.title: SPINNING!
customer_reviews.text: As far I can tell it’s exactly what my son wanted. It’s def good for beginners and more. My son loves to spin. Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: REERIE

customer_reviews.title: Good DJ mixer, need more time to say whether it is 'great' or just 'good'
customer_reviews.text: This is my first DJ mixer, and while I am a seasoned musician, I have yet to get the feel for the art of DJ mixing. I really got this for my 14 year old son who is interested in DJing, but it is more of a toy right now until he gets more time and used to the workflow and tool. The price is right, but it does seem like it would be way more useful with the full version of Serato. Overall still 4 stars (hopefully 5 when I spend more time with it).
customer_reviews.author: 85254_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The best affordable controller for Serato
customer_reviews.text: Excellent entry level controller that you won't be ashamed to use wherever Really really great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 12 yr old nephew and he’s having a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Gaspar Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who has been using one other popular controller in the same price range. He says this one is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Its don't come with usb cable.
customer_reviews.text: It was come in a amazon box. But when i open it,its not seal good enough. The tape is opened. And it didn't come with usb cable. Now I can't use it yet. I need to get the usb cable. So dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: dio abednego sakul

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the SB3, has alot of functions. Wish it came with serato dj pro. Advise to buy the pro version
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: great gadget for dj
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had 3prong outputs for speakers and mixer, but overall great mixer, controller! upgrade to dj pro is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners controller
customer_reviews.text: So after watching hundreds of YouTube videos, I decided to give this a shot. I purchased some beginner DJ Lessons, and got comfortable with it. Once you build your library up a bit, and get used to transitions and all that, it won’t be long before you’re playing in front of friends.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lacy III

customer_reviews.title: Must have for easy set up gigs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a turntablist, but I needed something more practical for gigs on the go. It works perfectly with my Asus computer and responds well to all my scratch techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great yet complicated...
customer_reviews.text: Great for learning how to DJ, but some of the buttons are a bit confusing!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: fx fade is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The eight pads are too small for beginners should be bigger. The rubber legs under should be higher. to allow a laptop stand leg to slide under. should have a master xlr output
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for your money
customer_reviews.text: Best controller for your money. By far superior to other controllers.
customer_reviews.author: kbear1973

customer_reviews.title: CAME COMPLETELY NON-FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: The controller won't connect to any laptop (tried new macbook pro and surface book, native cable and new USB-C to B lead, should have worked) but only the channel flashes red, meaning that the instrument can't draw adequate power. Need the vendor to get back to me about an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Swartzel

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box non-functional
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box non-functional and have been trying to get it to work with numerous Mac or Windows. Purchased a separate speaker to see if that would work and that didn’t either. If I could return this I would - wasted over $200 as this was a gift to my son.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Newb
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my first DJ controller purchase. Easy to learn and having a great time :D
customer_reviews.author: nickAH

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Dj for starter !
customer_reviews.text: I gladed i purchase this! Very easy to learn and enjoyable for thw peice I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kucik

customer_reviews.title: Best Controllers around!!
customer_reviews.text: My Friend and I are both Djs and we love this turntables and its lightweight and easy to mix sounds better than before than our previous DJ controllers! Worth every buck spent on this Controller.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this ddj sb3 controller for most beginners that now getting into the djing industry....
customer_reviews.text: I use this ddj sb3 controller on my 2 15inch powered speakers and it was soo surprising that it works so perfectly no problem and it runs on Serato dj lite I recommend buy this item it worth the money 😇✌️
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this I've had the sb2 and the mixtrack pro this tops them
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Great product to use and learn on
customer_reviews.text: I am beating on it bringing it up and down whacked it a few times works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I wonder if I got an open box model. There is a scratch on the deck 2 load button. Other than that it works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our adult son who loves using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Long

customer_reviews.title: mixer console
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is real nice for the price can do professional mixes really like it it is worth the 250 that I paid for it and shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Means

customer_reviews.title: I wanna know if the other sb3 controller that i purchased is going to work properly
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like the 2 LEVEL NOBS making static and Freezing my music Only reason i returned the first purchased :(
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent DJ Controller for beginners to semi pros
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to use and has some features similar to pro model controllers.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Easy to set up and use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wish the serato program had came free with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terhon James

customer_reviews.title: Fun but doesn’t come with tutorials or lessons.
customer_reviews.text: The board is great and fun to mess around with but they offer you nothing to actually learn how to dj. They have no tutorials included and there is little online that will help you that you don’t have to pay extra for.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Case isn't flat in the bottom of the device
customer_reviews.text: I asked for support because controller isn't standing because it's base isn't flat, but the only response obtained is "return it". I would like to keep my device but get some support in order to have it fixed. Maybe is a good idea to help customer to have it's device fixed rather than return it and wait some time to get another device. Just think it over.
customer_reviews.author: Tito S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic controller. Period.
customer_reviews.text: A fun and affordable instrument for manipulating digital music. If you have any interest in learning the art of DJ'ing, do yourself a favor and pick up one of these. I do recommend investing in the upgrade to Serato Pro to unlock the unit's full potential.
customer_reviews.author: John tran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DJ controller
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it it is 100% compatible with Virtualdj too.
customer_reviews.author: Acmedj

customer_reviews.title: Great DJ mixer for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Amazing DJ controller! I learnt how to mix using this. I really recommend it for beginners as well as intermediate and advanced DJs. Really glad I bought this instead of the Traktor controller!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I brought for backyard cookouts at home
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any level
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile DJ I got this for my son. I use it all the time because it’s really cool. For a beginner or maybe someone who had a controller break, this will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing controller because I Dj on the go. It is small and portable and has all the tools you would need. I wish it turns automatically however it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrique

customer_reviews.title: Hobbies come true with this item
customer_reviews.text: Learning on this has been the best experience It’s just like it says for beginners or for playing for a parties a must buy if you are interested in mixing music
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent! Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in one piece, everything functional, mapped it with traktor, amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Liber Lara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice controller
customer_reviews.text: I CAME FROM THE VYNAL EREA AND THIS CONTROLLER IS WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Michael jackson Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner DJ controller
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner DJ controller that integrates with Serato. Controls are straight forward and easy to use. Would have given it 5 stars if it come with the previous discount code for Serato Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Neversummer

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for Prime and hassle feee returns
customer_reviews.text: Could never get sound to come out of speakers. Seemed like it should have been straight forward, but also only a few buttons lit up and nothing seemed to worked even after buying new wires, speakers, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Happy I didn't shell out for an expensive controller
customer_reviews.text: I can now scatch what I hear in my head. DJing is not easy but this beginner controller can help you learn and diliver pro preformance if you're willing to learn. Also, SERATO!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is for sure great for beginners! I learned a lot with this. However, if you are looking to stream stear clear from this model. This is literally THE ONLY MODEL IN THE MARKET that doesn't support streaming capabilities (i.e. Twitch).
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Great product....material is durable and responds well to my derato program on my laptop... Loving it so far
customer_reviews.author: Jevanie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple and has everything you need to keep a party going
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pioneer DJ DJ Controller, Black, (DDJSB3)
feature_bullets: Intuitive layout, all of the features were designed to be where you need them, when you need them
Add scratch effects to cued and currently playing songs without a turntable thanks to Pad Scratch
Mixing is Seamless with the FX Fade feature. 5 inch durable aluminium jog wheel. Weight-4. 6 pounds
Constructed from premium materials and audio circuitry
Large, low-latency jog wheels to give you great scratch response and accuracy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,023 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
